channel.title: Wondering if someone could help me with making untradable items unseen in loots
channel.description:
Wondering if someone could help me with making untradable items unseen in loots, Like when you die against another player is isnt shown in the other persons loot, but the item like for example a fire cape re appears back in the players invent after death. so they dont lose the item... Thanks alot ^^, My server
almage.no-ip.biz
Client: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=EEHC53GG
